title: 【中英双语】习近平到访武汉，但我不怕，因为武汉公安在我家阳台做安全排查（图片集锦
contents:
Xi Jinping is visiting Wuhan, but I'm not scared, because Wuhan police is doing a security check at my apartment's balcony

相关问题：【治不了肺炎还治不了你】如何看待武汉小区每家安排代表防止乱喊？
Related Question: 【Can't contain the virus but can contain you】What do you think about the representatives sent to every home of a residential area in Wuhan?

图片欣赏（部分图片由其他葱油上传，谢谢你们）：
Images (some of the following are uploaded by other pincong users, thanks you):

Title: Jinxiu Jiangnan Owner's Group #2 (261 people)
  • Two representatives sitting in each home
  • (image)
  • Two representative sitting there (cry laugh face emoji)
  • See if you dare yell (outside the window) again
  • (cry laugh face emoji)



  • (video)
  • Can't see anything, if anyone can see anything please take more photos and let us share that touching feeling.
  • Don't even let us access the balcony. My sliding door to the balcony is also shut(by them).
  • I posted (in/about) two Wuhan group, then my Wechat was automatically logged out just a moment ago (cry laugh face emoji)
  • Seems they don't want us to spread the news before (he) leaves
  • Me too(Wechat logged out) (cry laugh face emoji) 




  • 2 police at my home
  • yeah, there been police knocking doors since 9 am, I was woken up by the knocking, extremely confused
  • i mean right now people at (my) home
  • police sat on my balcony, not letting us look (outside the window)


Title: Donghu Tingyuan Meshgrid(quarantine) #7 (471 people)
  • (sender: Building 29 Unit 2 volunteer) Owners in Unit 1/2, Building 29 attention, police from Police Departments of each district in Wuhan will be doing a [security check] in homes above 9th floor, will stay at your home for about 1 hour, will be in hazmat suit with disinfection preparations. Everyone please cooperate with the police cooperatively, they will communicate with you about the matter. Thank you.


  • The fuck
  • The residential area (he's) about to visit...
  • (sweat face emoji) ...got too much people.
  • Plain clothes police
  • People in other groups says plain clothes at every home
  • seems the RA's been emptied, no security, no logging, no temperature measurements
  • not allowed to open windows freely, snipers also in position


  • still at our home
  • how (are we) supposed to live our life with them guarding (on the balcony)
  • should we cook for them
  • they sit on the balconies
  • they all brought snacks themselves
  • what happens if i yell (outside the window)
  • no one's gonna yell (smile cover face emoji)
  • yell 'thank the party, thank the govt' then
  • that (sentence) should be okay
  • you ask others for me, is that (really) okay
  • asked. better not.


Title: Xi Jinping visits Wuhan to see the coronavirus preventive and controlling operations
CCTV news
Abstract: 10th March before noon, Xi Jinping arrived at Wuhan by air, to see the ... operations, and to visit the medical workers, the PLA commanders and soldiers, social workers, police, base level govt official, sinking (sent from higher level) govt official, volunteers, patients and residents at the front line of the fight.

Title: Donghu Tingyuan Meshgrid #3 (399 people)
  • hahahaha
  • can't see nothing from our home
  • haha
  • (the govt people) must be scared due to lastime they yelled 'fake' (at another high level govt official)
  • this time's the real deal
  • police sitting on our balcony, not letting me watch, not letting me go out 
  • (when) the people's livelihood compared with their black hats (govt jobs), the black hats are still more important


Text on man's back: Wuhan Public Safety [Public Safety meaning Police(Department) in China]


My hands were shaking when I received the notice, when I saw the No. 00001 fleet at Huaqiaocheng(Oversea Chinese City), that moment, I was just like all the other residents, journalists, medical workers in front of me, can't control the excitement and happiness within our heart, tears starts dropping, the two female host from HubeiTV ruined their delicate makeup, it's the tears of happiness! We been waiting for this moment for way too long, we been waiting for this moment for way too hard... Today Wuhan's sun shine brighter because of you, Wuhan's wind blows gentler because of you, the air cleaner because of you, today's Wuhan is the safest place in the world! Socialism best, long live the people, Long live the almighty China Communist Party!
Comments:
  • (the author) Long live the almighty CCP!!!
  • (the author) got discipline requirements, other photos ain't gonna post, and can't post actually, will be censored


Title: Donghu Tingyuan Meshgrid #5 (399 people) (yes, the number of ppl in a group says something about wechat)
  • Building 26 unit 1801 all normal.
  • (the same notice from the same volunteers you saw before)
  • One hour at home


  • Them snipers ready
  • (image)
  • hahahaha
  • my colleague got 2 police at his home watching
  • police let him yell 'warm welcome' outside the window
  • (cry laugh face emoji)
  • yell something else he'll become an inmate


Title: mud playing friends(48 people)
  • police stationed inside every home
  • Uncle Xi is visiting the RA across
  • prevent (us) from yelling random words
  • (image)
  • (the same old volunteer saying) + because our RA successfully obtained the no-infection-RA status, the govt officials come to verify, those who enter the RA were tested to be healthy, so no worries. Thank you for your support


Title: Donghu Tingyuan #3 (399 people)
  • see the screenshot, was from this news report, well said
  • 2 SWAT at my home, 6 more outside
  • those police worry about us going out
  • yeah, no going out, no photos
  • i took (photos) at the moment, then the police asked me to delete




  • (he) might come to our RA
  • yell 'all fake' ASAP
  • anything special at your RA these days
  • my unit is above the Party-People Center, right now people's police sitting at my home
  • every unit in my building got police guarding their balcony
  • 'warm heart' vegetables delivered
  • to each home
  • yes
  • not letting you go to the balcony, no yelling allowed either



  • China is the most secure country in the world
  • Like, super secure


汉口本无疫，暴政诛心疾。警在家中坐，习从天上来。

Wuhan won't have an epidemic,

If the tyrant didn't shut the people's mouth that fast.

Police sitting in your home,

There comes Uncle Xi.
